questions: Which two areas of India produce oranges mainly ?
Which crop is the major crop of rabi ?
By which other name is ‘slash and burn’ agriculture known ?
India is the largest producer as well as consumer of which agricultural product in the world ?
In which type of soil does maize grow well ?
Which crop is grown with the onset of monsoons and are harvested in the month of September and October ?

answers: Wheat, barley, peas, gram and mustard.

questions: In which system of agriculture, a single crop is grown on a large area ?

answers: Tea, coffee, rubber, sugarcane and banana.

questions: In which country the ‘slash and burn’ agriculture is known as ‘Roca’ ?
Hoe, dao, digging sticks are associated with which type of farming ?
Name the crop for which India is the largest producer in the world.
Which type of farming is intensive subsistence farming ?
Which country is the first largest producer of rice ?
Name the two important wheat growing zones in India.
answers: The Ganga-Satluj plains in the north-west and black soil region of the Deccan.

Which crop is known as golden fibre ?
